Articles.Content: Hi. I've been reading this forum and getting updates for my favorite mods for quite a long time now. I'm an avid KSP player since beta 0.16 and also I love astronomy to the point I read about it every single day. Well. That's it!

Welcome to the forums! There is an excellent community here with whom to share your love of space, and the triumphs and heartbreaks of your KSP missions.

Happy landings!
